cause.description:
10,000 miles from London, UK to Ulaanbataar, Mongolia in a grossly underpowered car to raise money for Mercy Corps. www.windmillgiants.com
Mercy Corps Mongolia supports rural communities to meet their economic and social needs, helping individuals, families and communities to become more self-sufficient, diversified in their production, and better linked to local, regional and national markets.
http://www.mercycorps.org/
1. Disadvantaged people should have new economic opportunities that respect and preserve their traditional way of life.
cause.mission: Drive from London to Mongolia to raise $1600 and awareness for Mercy Corps
cause.name: Mercy Corps - Mongol Rally
